title: Traveler: Losing Legong
description: Earth's society has collapsed, diasporas drain the best and brightest. Hundreds of years later, Myles, a young bureaucrat, drifts through his days on Legong aimlessly, until a Traveler from a recovered Earth arrives, sending his quiet colony spiraling into fear and chaos. Now Myles's actions will determine not only his future, but the fate of family, friends and the colony itself.
author: Tim Dennis
